name: Death's Calamity
description:
Short and primitive vertical slice for a school project.

Death's Calamity is a first person roguelike hack and slash that takes inspiration from the dark ambience and difficult combat of the Dark Souls series with a 3D Low Poly aesthetic.

Clear out rooms, wipe out enemies and defeat the final boss awating for you at the end of the dungeon.

Attack or block, your decision while in battle between this two can make the difference between death or victory.
